page.title: 12KINNEFF VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: In our{school}we have an old building and new building. The new school was built about 1950 and the old school 1860, as a{church school. We use the room in the old school as a gym hall. In the new school we have two classrooms, a small kitchen, a staff room and boys'and girls' toilets.We all have lunch in our classroom at the two long tables at the bottom of the room. We have 21 pupils in this school. Mr.Haining, our headmaster, teaches p5,p6 and p7 and Mrs.Reid teaches p1_4. We have a lady comes to serve the lunch which is brought from the kitchens at Bervie school. We have one cleaner and a school secretary. We have visiting teachers for art,music and physical education. They all come once a fortnight.
